body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Michael Young and the customer's name is Abigail Jackson.  The conversation is about Happy Animal Shelter (a Animal Shelter ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Amanda. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Amanda, I'm having trouble with my laptop.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can I please have your name to better assist you?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Could you please tell me your email address so I can look up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, John. Just to verify, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I have accessed your account. I see you have a premium support plan, which entitles you to free diagnostics. I will now transfer you to a technician who can further assist you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
